name: Sugar Snap Peas With Horseradish
keywords: horseradish, snap peas, side dish, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: Salt and freshly ground black pepper
1/4 cup freshly grated horseradish, or to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Combine stock and soy sauce in deep skillet over high heat and reduce to about 1/2 cup, 5 to 10 minutes. Add peas and stir frequently until they are bright green and tender and liquid is reduced to a glaze, about 5 minutes.
Turn heat to medium and stir in butter and salt (easy at first, because of soy sauce) and pepper to taste. Put in warmed bowl, top with horseradish, and serve.
